dragonFields.name: ambient_sound
dragonFields.description: Which sound to play when the dragon is idle

dragonFields.name: death_loot
dragonFields.description: The loot table to use when the dragon dies

dragonFields.name: hatch_time
dragonFields.description: The time it takes for the dragon to hatch

dragonFields.name: growth_time
dragonFields.description: The time it takes for the dragon to grow to full size

dragonFields.name: size_modifier
dragonFields.description: The size modifier of the dragon, a value of 1 is the default size. Affects the hitbox and model size

dragonFields.description: The primary color of the dragons spawn egg

dragonFields.name: secondary_color
dragonFields.description: The secondary color of the dragons spawn egg

dragonFields.name: immunities
dragonFields.description: Which damage types the dragon is immune to

dragonFields.name: habitats
dragonFields.description: Which habitats the dragon prefers, used for egg hatching

dragonFields.name: taming_items
dragonFields.description: The items used to tame the dragon

dragonFields.name: breeding_items
dragonFields.description: The items used to breed the dragon

dragonFields.name: hatch_particles
dragonFields.description: The particles of the dragon egg when hatching

dragonFields.name: loot_tables
dragonFields.description: In which loot tables can the dragon egg be found

dragonFields.name: accessories
dragonFields.description: The model accessories of the dragon
